bibl.title: Villages, Land and Population in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Texte remanié et complété d'une communication présentée au XIXe Congrès International de Papyrologie au Caire, 1989. - Introduction. - 1. Population figures in the literary sources. - 2. The total population: a matrix of possibilities. - 3. Population dynamics: some first steps. - 4. The size of villages in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: RATHBONE Dominic W., Villages, Land and Population in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
